message.content:
cs.NE, cs.ET, cs.AR, cs.AI, cs.SY

This paper is primarily focused on the development of neural networks for neuromorphic hardware, which falls under the category of "Neural and Evolutionary Computing" (cs.NE). Additionally, the paper discusses the limitations and constraints of neuromorphic hardware, which could also place it in the sub-category of "Emerging Technologies" (cs.ET). The paper proposes a methodology for transforming existing neural networks to meet the hardware constraints, which could be considered as a form of "Architecture" (cs.AR) or "Artificial Intelligence" (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the co-design optimization of hardware and software, which could be classified as "Systems and Control" (cs.SY).
